name: Cosco_Wood_X-Back_Folding_Chair_2_Pack
reviews: Nice looking chairs that fit in at any table and just as comfortable.
Good solid chairs, will help with extra guests and look so nice

My regular dining room chairs are espresso-finish cherry with an X-back, just like these. I needed 8 more chairs for Thanksgiving, so I ordered these with fingers crossed. When they arrived, I was shocked with how lovely they were, especially at this price point. Not only do they look nice, but they are very sturdy and comfortable. Very pleased with my purchase!
one of the chairs's legs broke off by the end of the first day I sat on it.
Minor scratches on the wood, but overall a practical folding chair at an affordable price.
Quality and comfort are great .I would purchase them again.
Ordered 2 - 2packs for game table. We ended up using the table and chairs for extra seating at a dinner I hosted. They worked out just fine. I like the fact that they fold up and can be stored.
description: Create additional seating for parties or family gatherings with this set of two folding chairs. Featuring an X-back design and a rich espresso finish, these chairs coordinate beautifully with a range of furnishings. Place them at your dining room table to seat more guests at a dinner party, or use them at a card table for an upscale poker night.Set includes two collapsible chairsSturdy wood construction delivers enduring qualityPadded black vinyl upholstered seats wipe clean for added convenienceEspresso wood finish adds an elegant look to each chairEach chair weighs 11.8 pounds for easy transportEach chair accommodates up to 250 poundsOverall dimensions measure 35.4"H x 20.85"W x 16.9"DStyleContemporary, UrbanMaterialWoodFinishEspresso FinishChair TypeDining ChairsSet SizeSet of 2AssemblyAssembledChair Back HeightStandardColorBrownFurniture Frame MaterialWoodFurniture PatternSolidSeat StyleUpholstered
